channel.title: Last chance appeals
channel.description:
A lot of accounts that got perm banned now have a last chance appeal
I heard about the last chance appeals and would like to learn more about them, so I know what the best strategy to use to appeal with..
I also heard they are read by a bot, does anyone know more info?
..btw, if you haven't looked, go to appeal offence/ban if you are perm banned, you might have a last chance appeal ;D[br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2007, 04:56:37 PM[/size][hr]Any info on bots reading appeals and the best way to submit them would be very appreciated :)[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 05:02:50 PM[/size][hr]I might also be willing to pay for info, and tips once my account is unbanned, it is pretty rich..

item.title: Last chance appeals
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

[quote=“Dboi, post:7, topic:77055”]You Recently Banned me, As a result I killed my Mum, Because it was all here fault.

Please UnBan me, I Just killed my Best Freind and I feel Bad.

Yours Sincerly, Jack the Ripper.[/quote]
U R TEH FUNNY ;D

Read full topic
